title: Thread stuck in device driver
body:
My new computer keeps shutting down with a thread stuck in device driver error, placing me in low priority queue for leaving. I began playing ARAMs to get out of the low priority queue, with no issues during my sentence, but every time I escape low priority queue, the error occurs again! 

I had never had these problems  before and now I keep getting punished for leaving when my computer is crashing. I really hate what it does to my teams and its really crappy that I now have to wait 20 minutes to get into queue.

any information would be greatly appreciated

All the Best

pizzadriven1

replies.body:
Hmmmmm it kinda sounds like you might be seeing a blue screen with that thread stuck in device driver? That generally means something is going really wrong with one of your drivers, which that blue screen should actually say what driver is messing up. 

If you can remember, try googling what driver that was and update it if needed, but you can always reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for some help along the way if you need!
